name: Treasury's Twitch - Edge-To-Edge Video, Dark [NEW]
description: The original Treasury's Twitch style. Makes the video fill up the whole available space, makes the menu smaller and auto hiding, darkens and dims the video environment and carefully tweaks a lot of small things while retaining the official feel. Also removes advertisements.
additional_info:
Treasury's Twitch

● Edge-To-Edge Video
● Auto-Hide Menu (Appear on Hover)
● Dark and Dim Video Environment
● Better Layout

Also Check Out my Twitch.tv Crosshair Dot:
https://userstyles.org/styles/117571/twitch-tv-crosshair-dot-treasury

If you enjoy the style and want to support me, you can follow me or donate on my twitch channel:
http://twitch.tv/treasury

http://fb.com/treasuryTV
http://google.com/+ViktorKincses

discussions.name: Nice style, which info area is a little annoying
No way of getting out of viewer list?
Is there a way to remove the auto-hide menu part? Best twitch.tv menu I ever used btw
"Posts" section under stream is hidden, and "Info" section under stream is misaligned
Can't see when you click 'Share' or the gear icon. Popup shows up above.
